name: CUSTOMProduct ingredients #5
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign layout_type = section.settings.layout_type
  assign layout_type_mobile = section.settings.layout_type_mobile

  assign cards_gap = section.settings.cards_gap
  assign cards_gap_mobile = section.settings.cards_gap_mobile
  assign cards_view = section.settings.cards_view
  assign cards_view_mobile = section.settings.cards_view_mobile
  assign cards_mt = section.settings.cards_mt
  assign cards_mt_mobile = section.settings.cards_mt_mobile

  assign card_padding_horizontal = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal
  assign card_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign card_padding_vertical = section.settings.card_padding_vertical
  assign card_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign card_bg_color = section.settings.card_bg_color
  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_border_color = section.settings.card_border_color
  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius

  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile

  assign card_content_align = section.settings.card_content_align
  assign card_content_align_mobile = section.settings.card_content_align_mobile

  assign content_horizontal_align = ""
  if card_content_align == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif card_content_align == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if card_content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif card_content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color

  assign read_more = section.settings.read_more
  assign read_less = section.settings.read_less
  assign small_text_size = section.settings.small_text_size
  assign use_read_more = section.settings.use_read_more
    
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile

  assign ingredients_gap = section.settings.ingredients_gap
  assign ingredients_gap_mobile = section.settings.ingredients_gap_mobile
  assign ingredients_mt = section.settings.ingredients_mt
  assign ingredients_mt_mobile = section.settings.ingredients_mt_mobile

  assign ingredient_padding_horizontal = section.settings.ingredient_padding_horizontal
  assign ingredient_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.ingredient_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign ingredient_padding_vertical = section.settings.ingredient_padding_vertical
  assign ingredient_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.ingredient_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign ingredient_bg_color = section.settings.ingredient_bg_color
  assign ingredient_radius = section.settings.ingredient_radius
  assign ingredient_custom = section.settings.ingredient_custom
  assign ingredient_font = section.settings.ingredient_font
  assign ingredient_size = section.settings.ingredient_size
  assign ingredient_size_mobile = section.settings.ingredient_size_mobile
  assign ingredient_height = section.settings.ingredient_height
  assign ingredient_color = section.settings.ingredient_color
  assign ingredient_border_thickness = section.settings.ingredient_border_thickness
  assign ingredient_border_color = section.settings.ingredient_border_color

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ ingredient_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .product-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }}
  }
  
  .product-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .product-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative !important;
    margin-top: {{ cards_mt_mobile }}px !important;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .product-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    align-items: stretch !important;
  }

  .product-grid-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    align-items: stretch;
    grid-template-columns: repeat({{ cards_view_mobile }}, 1fr);
    gap: {{ cards_gap_mobile }}px;
    margin-top: {{ cards_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .product-item-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: column !important;
    justify-content: space-between !important;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    height: auto !important;
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }} !important;
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px !important;
    background-color: {{ card_bg_color }} !important;
    overflow: hidden !important;
  }

  .product-image-{{ section.id }} {
    overflow: hidden; 
    display:  block;
  }

  .product-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .product-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .product-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .product-info-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    flex: 1 1 0;
    padding: {{ card_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px !important;
  }

  .product-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;    
    text-align: {{ card_content_align_mobile }};
    text-transform: unset;
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    color: {{ title_color }};  
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .product-text-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ card_content_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;    
  }

  .product-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;    
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    color: {{ text_color }};  
    display: inline-block;
  }

  .product-text-small-{{ section.id }},
  .product-text-full-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .product-text-small-{{ section.id }}.active,
  .product-text-full-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: block;
  }

  .product-text-more-{{ section.id }},
  .product-text-less-{{ section.id }} {
    text-decoration: underline;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .product-ingredients-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    margin-top: {{ ingredients_mt_mobile }}px;
    gap: {{ ingredients_gap_mobile }}px;
    align-items: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .product-ingredient-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ ingredient_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ ingredient_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ ingredient_radius }}px;
    border: {{ ingredient_border_thickness }}px solid {{ ingredient_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ ingredient_bg_color }};
    margin: 0;    
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    font-size: {{ ingredient_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ ingredient_height }}%;
    color: {{ ingredient_color }};  
  }

  .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    z-index: 2;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 1%;
  }

  .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 1%;
  }

  .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .product-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ heading_align }}
    }
    
    .product-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .product-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      position: relative !important;
      margin-top: {{ cards_mt }}px !important;
      margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
    }

    .product-grid-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: repeat({{ cards_view }}, 1fr);
      gap: {{ cards_gap }}px;
      margin-top: {{ cards_mt }}px;
    }

    .product-info-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ card_padding_vertical }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal }}px !important;
    }

    
    .product-title-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ card_content_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .product-text-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ card_content_align }};
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;    
    }

    .product-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .product-ingredients-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
      margin-top: {{ ingredients_mt }}px;
      gap: {{ ingredients_gap }}px;
    }

    .product-ingredient-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ ingredient_padding_vertical }}px {{ ingredient_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ ingredient_size }}px;
    }

    
    .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .product-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .product-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .product-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if ingredient_custom %}
  <style>
    .product-ingredient-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ ingredient_font.family }}, {{ ingredient_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ ingredient_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ ingredient_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if layout_type_mobile == 'grid' %}
  <style>
    .product-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }

    .product-grid-{{ section.id }} {
      display: grid !important;   
    }
  </style> 
{% else %}   
  <style>
    .product-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block !important;
    }

    .product-grid-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
  </style> 
{% endif %}

{% if layout_type == 'grid' %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .product-slider-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }

      .product-grid-{{ section.id }} {
        display: grid !important;  
      }
    }
  </style> 
{% else %}   
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .product-slider-{{ section.id }} {
        display: block !important;   
      }

      .product-grid-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style> 
{% endif %}


{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .product-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .product-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .product-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .product-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .product-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .product-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }  
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .product-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .product-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9) translateY(-50%);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9) translateY(-50%);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .product-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .product-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .product-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .product-item-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .product-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .product-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ cards_gap_mobile }}px;
  } 

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .product-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .product-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {

    } 

    .product-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .product-item-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(100% / {{ cards_view }} - ({{ cards_gap }}px));
    }
  }
</style>

<script>
  function initProductIngredients5() {
    document.querySelector(`.product-slider-{{ section.id }}`).classList.remove('preview');
    const slider = new Swiper(`.product-slider-{{ section.id }}`, {
      speed: 300,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: `.product-btn-next-{{ section.id }}`,
        prevEl: `.product-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}`,
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.product-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gapMobile || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.product-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.viewMobile),
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.product-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.product-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.viewMobile),
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.product-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.product-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.view),
        }
      },
    });

    const items = document.querySelectorAll('.product-item-{{ section.id }}');

    items.forEach(item => {
      const smallText = item.querySelector('.product-text-small-{{ section.id }}');
      const fullText = item.querySelector('.product-text-full-{{ section.id }}');
      const moreButton = item.querySelector('.product-text-more-{{ section.id }}');
      const lessButton = item.querySelector('.product-text-less-{{ section.id }}');

      if (moreButton && smallText && fullText) {
          moreButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
              smallText.classList.remove('active');
              fullText.classList.add('active');
          });
      }

      if (lessButton && smallText && fullText) {
          lessButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
              fullText.classList.remove('active');
              smallText.classList.add('active');
          });
      }
  });

  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initProductIngredients5);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initProductIngredients5);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initProductIngredients5);
  }
</script>
